inn1.comm: and he begins by overstepping, and the ball is down leg side, so Sri Lanka are on the ball, good new-ball carry though
back of a length and lifting, Tharanga stands and lets the ball rise and clip him high on the thigh
back of a length outside off stump, he stands and drops the hands on it, getting an inside-edge to the leg side and he calls for the quick single to get off the mark
back of a length outside off stump again, he taps that with an angled bat in front of point and calls for the run, but sent back
back of a length just outside off stump, he hops and punches in front of point again, calls for the run, and point gives away an overthrow with a careless shy back to the stumps
another no-ball, this one stands up at about 80mph and has the batsman in a muddle, ducking to get away from it
good ball! Short and rising, Jayasuriya is squared up and gets a leading edge that pops up and lands safely in front of point
short, rising delivery outside off stump, which Jayasuriya leaves be
fullish, moving ball on middle and off, defended back to Mukuddem
overpitched outside off stump, almost a yorker, Tharanga just stands and jams the bat down it, squeezing it wide of point and picking up a brace
good length outside off stump, Tharanga drives but right to short extra cover
good length ball, pitching outside off stump and seaming back over the top of off, Tharanga seems to know where it is and shoulders arms, well bowled
another moving, good length ball outside off stump, Tharanga again shoulders arms, cautiously, about 70mph
back of length, pitches on leg stump and moves into him, he covers off stump and defends off the back foot
short and wide, rising too, its another no-ball, so Jayasuriya chases it with a big flash of the bat and the thick edge flies well over slip and down to the third man fence
he oversteps again, the ball lands outside leg stump, Jayasuriya flicks it to short fine leg for the single
back of a length on leg stump, he shuffles and tickles it down to fine leg for one
wide, and a no-ball for overstepping, and Hurdle's struggling here
fuller outside off stump, swings away and Jayasuriya lets it be
another wide ball down leg stump, poor stuff this
back of a length on leg stump, he shuffles and turns it well off the hips and the ball rolls down to fine leg for four more
back of a length just outside off stump, he hops and pushes with soft hands into the covers for a quick run
another wide, way down the leg side and the 'keeper and umpire have more work to do, Hurdle's body language not looking good at all, he just turns and ambles back to his mark
back of a length on leg stump, Tharanga hops and works it past square leg for another easy run
full toss outside off stump, ANOTHER no-ball, and Jayasuriya rightfully slaps that past point for four more
he's lost the plot! Oversteps again, Jayasuriya hops and pushes wide of point for another single
and the result is another no-ball, this one swings down leg stump too
good one at last, a legal delivery on the stumps, which Jayasuriya calmly defends back to Hurdle
not too good, angled down the pads and Tharanga clips it down to fine leg, umpire signals leg-byes
lands on middle and leg and he works that through square leg with ease
fuller, slight movement into him, tucked past short fine leg with no hassles
lands on middle and leg, tucked to square leg
good movement, lands outside off stump and beats the edge of the bat
good length ball outside off stump, he stands and defends to the off side
fullish ball, a better length, straight on off stump and Jayasuriya drops the bat on it to turn it to midwicket
back of a length down leg stump, flicked to square leg for the single
bang, thats six! Very full and wide, begging to be hit, Tharanga reaches for it with a free swing of the arm and slashes it well over backward point, and the ball just lands over the ropes
shorter one this time, he rocks back and cuts to backward point
extra bounce on that one outside off stump, Tharanga hops and defends back to the bowler
full and moving away from outside off stump, close to being called a wide but the umpire just calls over
good length delivery on off stump, hint of movement, Jayasuriya gets over it and turns it to short fine leg for one
back of a length outside off stump, he stands and punches to the covers
down leg, turned to backward square leg
good length outside off stump, Tharanga comes forward and defends back to the bowler
fuller on the stumps, Tharanga rolls the wrists over it and flicks, finding the gap backward of square for four, even with the thick inside-dge
down leg stump, easily flicked out to deep fine leg for two
full and wide, moving away, called a wide
back of a length on off stump, he gets behind it and pushes down the ground, mid-off comes across and fields
here he goes! That was in the slot outside off stump and he picks it up over mid-on, ball lands and stops and the batsmen have to settle for three
short of a length outside off stump, he gets up and drives off the backfoot to mid-off
back of a length well outside off stump, Tharanga watches it into Minor's gloves
short of a length outside off stump again, he hops and square-drives off the backfoot out to deep point
beaten! A fuller, swinging delivery outside off stump, beats Jayasuriya's forward prod and Minors appeals, but not the bowler
full and wide, Tharanga stands rooted and chases it, getting a thick outside edge that flies well over the man at short third man for four
moving delivery outside off stump, beats the outside edge again

good length outside off stump, Tharanga stands rooted and flashes the bat it, getting a thick-edge that pops up over point and lands in the deep, batsmen hurry for three, good work by Cann and Romaine to haul it in
short and wide, Jayasuriya chops it to point and Cann again throws himself to the right, full stretch, and saves four
good length outside off stump, pushed to cover
back of a length on middle and leg, worked to the onside, Tucker moves across and does the fielding himself
good length outside off stump, he leans into it and drives to cover
good length again, he comes forward and drops the bat on it in defense, a good line and length from Mukuddem

gone! Short and wide, Jayasuriya rocks back on the hard cut but cant beat Pitcher at point, who takes the ball smack in his lap! Well held, and Mukuddem exults, and rightfully so - thats a big wicket to get in a big tournament!

edged and DROPPED! Oh my word! A good length outside off stump, the movement surprises him, he reaches out and drives and the edge flies to the right of  Leverock at slip, who fails to latch on....how lucky is that?
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and defends, pinching the run in front of point
good length outside off stump, left alone
drifts into leg stump, he eases it around the corner to the man down in the deep for one
good length on middle and leg, he comes forward and defends, ball pops up momentarily but there's no fielder in close
good length again, he comes onto the frontfoot and defends again
good length on the stumps, he comes onto the frontfoot and defends it again
back of a length outside off stump, he stands up and defends back to Tucker
drifts to leg stump, Tharanga flicks with an inside-edge and steals one in front of backward square leg
short outside off stump, not enough room to cut but he does so anyways, and luckily places it wide of short third man for one
full down the legs, and called wide

good ball, a tad fuller and moving in, slower one too, Tharanga stands rooted and drives, the ball comes in and raps him on the back leg in front of off stump, that looked out but the umpire shakes his head...hmmm...
outside off stump, steered to deep point for one
overpitched outside off stump, he just leans onto bended knee and slaps the drive past cover for four, as easy as they come for someone like him
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and drops the soft hands on it, and calls for the quick single as the ball rolls in front of point
back of a length on off stump, he stands and defends back to the bowler
and can you believe it? Yeah, you probably can...its a wide down the leg side...
fuller on off stump, Jayawardene rolls the wrists over it and works it past backward square leg for one
short of a length outside off stump, his feet go nowhere as he cuts wide of backward point for one out to the man in the deep
back of a length outside off stump, he shuffles and places it in front of square leg for one
short of a good length outside off stump, he hops and places it to point
good ball, comes in from a good length outside off stump and Tharanga just manages to get the bat down on it, the ball rolls to point

and he strikes, Hurdle! This one is angled down leg stump off a shorter length, then it bounces and moves off the seam, and Tharanga just manages to tickle it into the gloves of a diving Minors behind the stumps!
bad ball, moves well down leg stump and Minors has work to do, wide called
good length ball outside off stump, Jayawardene gets a stride forward and leaves it be, Minors takes it well
identical delivery, but it stays a bit low, and Minors bends to take it
again he lands it on a good length outside off stump, inviting the drive, but Jayawardene leaves it alone
overpitched this time, he comes forward and meets it with a booming offdrive but straight to the man at cover
back of a length outside off stump, moves in and he just manages to get a bit of bat on it, ball rolls to square leg
good length ball outside off stump, bit of movement into it, Jayawardene gets forward and leaves it be
short of a length and rising into him, he stands and defends off the backfoot, ball rolls to the on side
back of a length outside off stump, Sangakkara shuffles to off stump and defends back to the bowler
good length on off stump, he gets behind it again and defends back
back of a length outside off stump again, he stands tall and drives to mid-off
great ball, sir! Good seam movement off a sweet length outside off stump, Sangakkara sort of stands and thinks about walking into it, and the ball shaves past the outside edge
fuller one now, outside off stump, to which he comes forward and shoulders arms
drifts down leg stump, and he tickles it off the pads down to fine leg
drifts into leg stump again, tickle to short fine leg for one
overpitched, he leans into it and drives to point
good length, moving delivery outside off stump, Sangakkara shuffles across and leaves it be
dragged in short on leg stump, he rocks into position to pull but gets it high on the bat and the ball scoots down to short fine leg
good length just outside off stump, Jayawardene walks into it and defends back to the bowler
back of a length on off stump, Sangakkara stands and turns that to the on side
short of a length on middle and leg, turned in the air but in the gap at square leg out to the man in the deep
overpitched outside off stump, he leans forward and drives down the ground, mid-off moves quickly and fields, but its still a run
banged in short outside off stump, Jayawardene latches onto the pull but the ball climbs on him and he fails to middle it, and a misfield at square leg allows him a run
overpitched on the stumps as he looks for the yorker, Sangakkara drives to mid-on
back of a length down leg stump, wide called
a low full toss outside off stump but he fails to put it away, his square-drive going straight to point
back of a length on leg stump, turned to square leg, no chance of a run there
back of a length outside off stump, left alone for the 'keeper, Minors
in the slot to be driven, but Jayawardene doesnt time his coverdrive all that well, but its in the gap nevertheless and he hustles hard for two
outside off stump, defended to the covers
fractionally short outside off stump, chopped to point
fuller outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to cover
short of a good length outside off stump, no pace whatsoever, and Jayawardene watches it into Minors' gloves
a tad fuller, he drives down the ground past mid-on with a full face of the bat, no stopping that one
short of a length outside off stump, he shuffles to off and opens the face of the bat but cant beat point, 'NO' is the loud call back to his partner
overpitched outside off stump, driven to mid-off
good length outside off stump, moves in and he defends back to the bowler
short and wide, cracked off the backfoot and thats well stopped at backward point, saving certain runs
almost gets the yorker right on off stump, Sangakkara gets the bat down in time
good length outside off stump, defended back to Tucker
almost! Full and wide, Sangakkara throws the bat at it and backward point flings himself to his left but cant quite reach it, and thats four
good length on the stumps, worked into the onside and the big man Leverock gives chase, much to the crowd's cheer, and he stops it in the deep
full down leg stump, he looks to flick but misses out
great ball to end the over, landing on a sweet length outside off stump and beating his forward prod, good stuff from Tucker
a shocker! Very, very wide outside off stump
good length outside off stump, played late and with soft hands for the single down to third man
bad ball again, very wide of leg stump for the second wide of the over
better, better...a good length fractionally outside off stump forces Sangakkara to shoulder arms
fuller, close to a yorker length, Sangakkara shuffles and drives expansively but not timed well and the ball just rolls back to Hurdle
he oversteps - hugely - for the over, and Sangakkara flicks it to midwicket...count those no-balls, people
back of a length on middle and leg, Sangakkara shuffles and tucks it into the on side
good ball, a yorker almost, but not quite there, and Sangakkara jams the bat down and turns it with the wrists for one to midwicket
overpitched, Jayawardene comes forward and turns it to mid-off, but doesnt chance the single
good length outside off stump, driven to covers
good length on off stump, he mistimes the attempted drive back to Tucker
overpitched well outside off stump, he leans into it and square-drives past point, out to the sweeper, and Jayawardene calls for the second
good length outside off stump, played to cover
good length again, he comes onto the front foot and defends to cover
marginally overpitched and he comes on top of it and drives to mid-off for a very quick single, and makes it safely at the other end
tossed up from over the wicket, no real spin on it, Sangakkara works it to midwicket
wide of off stump, Sangakkara rocks over it and cuts it past point, Jayawardene hustles for the third, well done
tossed up again, he comes forward and defends
looped up on off stump, Jayawardene gets cheeky and paddles it around the corner for one
flatter trajectory on middle and off, driven towards mid-on
flatter on middle and off, tucked into the midwicket region
good length outside off stump, comes forward and defends back to Tucker
some width offered this time and he square-drives to point
good length outside off stump, comes forward and drives to mid-off for one
overpitched outside off stump, driven to short cover
really slow delivery, 51mph outside off stump, and he cant beat the off side
fuller on middle and off, Sangakkara stands and drives to the left of Tucker, who dives full length and stops it
tossed up outsid off stump, driven to mid-off
tossed up on middle and off, driven to midwicket for one
tossed up again around off stump, Jayawardene initially comes forward but then waits to see if it turns and defends to point
flatter one outside off stump, he comes forward and defends back to Leverock
now he breaks free! Gives him the charge and hits it inside-out over extra cover for a one-bounce four, good shot
tossed up on the stumps, he gets in line of the ball and paddle-sweeps around the corner to the man down there in the deep
good length outside off stump, he greets it with a good-looking cover drive but cant find the gap
looped up, a full toss on leg stump, he pulls it but cant time it well, and thats just one into midwicket
good length outside off stump, he drives well into the gap on the off side and picks up a brace
he oversteps, the ball lands on a length outside off stump and is driven to cover

close! Fractionally overpitched outside off stump and Sangakkara gets down on one knee and drives in the air to cover, where the man dives forward and almost gets it, but the ball clearly landed just before him
good length again, driven into the off side
good length on off stump, played back to the bowler
tossed up around off stump, Jayawardene drives to mid-off for one
flatter outside off stump, driven past cover out to the sweeper for one more
flatter one again on off stump, driven down the ground and Leverock dives to his right and stops it, but the ball rolls away for one
flighted up on leg stump, he tries the sweep but misses
tossed up, he uses the feet well and dances down to drive through the covers, shot
a tad flatter this time outside off stump, he comes forward and pushes in front of mid-off for an easy single
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and steers it to point
full and wide, he reaches for it and drives to point again
good length, this time he waits for it and dabs it in front of point for one
back of a length around off stump, he goes back and punches to mid-off
full and wide, he waits for it and slashes the drive past point for one, Leverock dives and stops runs
short and wide, chopped hard just wide of point for one
drifts down leg stump and Sangakkara whips it out to deep backward square leg
tossed up outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to cover
flatter outside off stump, he gets down and sweeps hard for one just past square leg
fired in flat down leg stump, he sweeps but cant find the gap
shorter one, he shuffles to leg stump and waits for it, then drives to cover
tossed up, he sweeps well for one
tossed up, he sweeps out to the man in the deep for one more
Full ball, driven back to the bowler
Full outside off, driven crisply through extra cover for a single
WALLOP! Jayawardene backs away and slog sweeps way over midwicket for a six. He's equalled his highest World Cup score with that shot
Slightly slower and full outside off, driven through extra cover for a single
Sangakkara tries to swipe across the line but only manages a thick inside edge to fine leg for a brace
fired in down leg stump, he too sweeps to short fine leg
Trying to sweep from outside off, rapped on the pads and deflected to the off side
Takes a long stride forward and drives down the ground for a single
Tapped to short midwicket for a single
Crash! Sangakkara waltzes down the ground and smacks it over midwicket for four!. Sri Lanka's batsman getting into the mood now!
tossed up on the off stump, driven away for one
tossed up outside leg stump, Sangakkara dances down and chips it into midwicket for two
shorter outside off stump, cut hard but right to point
shorter, cut hard and the thick edge flies safely past short third man
flatter on middle and off, tucked past square leg to bring up his 50, and thats come after a long time...not since last summer at Old Trafford
good length on middle and leg, worked past square leg for two
and he too starts off with a wide well outside off stump
good length outside off stump, he gets to the pitch and drives past off side
short and wide, cut past point for one
good length outside off stump, eased into the covers

short, wide, cut hard and....dropped! By that man Leverock again! It was easier than the first one, a simple in-and-out to his left at point, and Cann is not happy at all....and its a single as well...oh boy...
back of a length outside off stump, defended to point
drifts down leg stump and he clips it past square leg for four to round off the over
tossed up on middle and off, driven to mid-on for one
flatter one on off stump, whipped past midwicket for two and thats his half-century as well...played, played...
tossed up on a length, he comes forward and defends it back
quicker one but off line, drifts down leg stump, and Sangakkara clips it to short fine leg
middle and leg line, worked past midwicket for one more
width offered and he gets down on bended knee and square-drives out to the man in the deep for a well-run two
short and wide, he reaches out and dabs it down to third man for one
really wide, even Sangakkara is beaten as he reached out and tries to drive
wide again, this time he manages to get bat on it and slaps it to backward point
short and wide, he too reaches out and cuts, and Leverock throws himself around at backward point to save runs, and the ground shudders as he lands
oh ho! Dragged in shortter, Sangakkara looks to pull but mistimes it up in the air, and it lands safely between Leverock and cover...someone shouldve got to it
short and wide, he reaches out and slaps a cut to Leverock, who again dives and stops runs
short and wide, cut out to the deep for one
short and wide, he leans back and runs it off the face of the bat past gully, done very late and fine
flatter on middle and off, pushed out past mid-off for one
crack, thats four! Sangakkara comes down the track and lifts the low full toss imperiously off the pads and clears midwicket for four...thats the 200 up as well
pushed into the on side for one, easy as they come
fired up down leg stump and Jayawardene uses the feet well, coming out and clipping it over square leg for four
tossed up down leg stump, and he works it out to fine leg for one to retain strike
fired in on off stump, he clips it past square leg for one
flat one on middle and off, driven to midwicket
flatter outside off stump, Sangakkara flashes a cut and the thick edge carries it down to third man for four
tossed up on leg stump, he tries to sweep but mistimes it
tossed up on leg again, short fine leg was up and he sweeps it right there for free runs
quicker and shorter, he swivels in his pull shot, not timed well but in the gap behind square
tossed up outside off stump, swept hard out to deep backward square leg
flat outside off stump, Jayawardene uses the feet well and drives past mid-off for one more, this is very easy batting
and he's gone! Leverock gets a wicket and isnt he thrilled! Tossed up outside off stump, down goes Sangakkara in his favourite slog-sweep, and he finds Tucker out on the deep midwicket ropes
tossed up on leg stump, Silva sweeps past square leg for one to get off the mark
flat on leg stump, easily pushed to square leg for one
tossed up again, pushed to the on side for a quick single
flatter on middle and off, driven down to long-on for one
flat on off stump, defended back
shorter on middle and leg, pulled through square leg for one
tossed up outside off stump, driven to the right of mid-off for one more
tossed up outside off stump, he clears the leg and sweeps behind square in the gap and collects four
flatter this time, but he uses the feet well and drives it down the ground
flatter again, this time he advances and drives to mid-on
flat outside off stump, he too uses his feet and crunches a drive past point
tossed up, he comes down and defends to the covers, calling for the run
quicker one outside off stump, he comes forward and tries to sweep it but the ball pops up off the glove into his grill and falls to the off side
he oversteps, and fires it onto leg stump for Silva to defend
tossed up, he uses the feet and drives out to the sweeper
flat outside off stump, he waits for it and drives to point
comes on the frontfoot and drives it to sweeper cover
and thats half a dozen! Tossed up  Jayawardene gets hold of it and hammers it over long-on
thats huge! Tossed up, down the track he comes and smacks it handsomely over long-on for maximum! Jayawardene!
very cheekily done, waited for it and delicately ran it down to third man, and thats four more
tossed up on middle and leg, he moves to leg stump and pushes it to the off side
shot! Tossed up outside off stump, he makes room, advances down the track, and hammers it through the off side for four, that was hit very hard
flatter trajectory on middle and leg, worked to midwicket but he cant find the gap

what a blinder! Brilliant stuff from Hurdle in the deep! Jayawardene slogs this from middle and leg very, very flat in the air over midwicket, and Hurdle, covering good ground on the ropes, dives full length going to to his right and plucks it, one-handed, as it dips on him!
good length outside off stump, he leaves it be
good length on middle and leg, flicked into midwicket
good length on middle and leg, driven back to Cann
width outside off stump, he frees the arms and drives into the covers
tossed up outside off stump, he uses the feet well and drives to cover
quicker one, he comes forward and pushes to cover, calls for the run and gets it
and again, he just taps that into the covers and sets off
comes down the track and lifts it off the legs over midwicket, against the turn, and picks up four in the big gap out there, well done
tossed up, he uses those soft hands to pick up another run into the covers
quicker one on off stump, this time he falls over as he defends and its a dot ball
half-volley outside off stump, he leans into it and drives between cover and point for a brace
back of a length outside off stump, he goes back and pushes down to long-off
a full toss outside off stump, he looks to sweep but misses and gets rapped on the front leg, but the impact was outside the line
short and wide, crunched out to the sweeper for one
full toss outside off stump, its clubbed hard backward of square leg and looks certain to reach the ropes, but the fielder out there throws himself around and stops it, well done
short and wide, played late out to third man
tossed up on off stump, driven down to long-on
tossed up, he uses the feet well to convert it into a full toss and drives past cover
quicker and flatter, he advances and heaves it across the line through midwicket out to the sweeper
flighted outside off stump, he sweeps around the corner for one out to the man at deep fine leg, and thats the end of Leverock's spell
aims for the yorker buts its going down leg stump, and the batsman cant time his flick well at all
full down the legs, he comes out of his box and clips it behind square for one out to deep fine leg
straighter one on the stumps, he comes out and tries to work it to the on side but gets an inside-edge to the off side
good length ball on middle and off, he shuffles and taps it past square leg for one
good length ball on off stump, but he's already stepped well outside the crease and gets rapped on the pads as he tries to flick across the line
good length outside off stump, he waits for it and then steers it wide of point for one to keep hold of the strike
good length on middle and leg, he cleverly paddles it around the corner and with fine leg up, thats four all the way, nicely done by Dilshan
back of a length outside off stump, he makes room and punches to point for the single
good length outside off stump, he makes room and plays it late down to third man for one more
comes down the track to a back of a length delivery and hammers it past covers but the man out on the ropes does the fielding
this one's shorter and wider, but as he's left the crease he's cramped for room an can only cut that past point
fuller down the legs, and he paddles it down to fine leg to bring up a good half-century in good time, excellently done on World Cup debut

full going down leg, he comes forward and paddles it around the corner and Tucker at short fine leg dives to his right and snatches it inches off the ground, very, very well done at the tail end of the innings
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and opens the face of the bat, driving into the covers to get off the mark first ball
full toss outside off stump, he fails to latch on and can only hammer it through square leg
a full toss drifting down leg stump, Maharoof is surprised by it but still manages to put it away over square leg for four
a touch wider outside off stump, Maharoof clears the front leg and flashes at it, and the resultant thick outside edge runs away for four
heave ho! He comes down the track, swings the bat at it, and connects with air
back of a length outside off stump, he makes room and looks to cut, misses, and Bermuda will gladly take the dot ball
dropped! Good length outside off stump, he frees the arms, slashes, and the thick edge spirals up in the air and Cann in the deep at third man fails to latch on

but not this time! Maharoof has a lusty swing across the line, doesnt time it all that well, and Hemp out in the deep holds his nerve, judges it to perfection, and gobbles it up down there at deep square leg
good length outside off stump, he sweeps from where it lands past square leg out to the man on the ropes, for a couple
banged in short and wide, he makes room and uppercuts over point for one out to the sweeper
fullish delivery outside off stump, he makes room and drives down to long-off for a couple, and Sri Lanka end up with a very healthy 321 for 6

inn2.comm: bang on target, good line and length, Smith defends
good length, angled delivery across him and he leaves it be
good one, closer to off stump and Smith defends compactly
movement in the air, a good length outside off stump, Smith defends with an inside-edge to the on side
and Vaas gets his man! Classical left-armer's dismissal, right on the money, pitched on off stump and moved in to rap Smith plumb in front of middle and leg, and he's a goner
good ball, moving away from him outside off stump, and thats a great first over
strays down leg stump, ball clips the back leg through to Sangakkara
back of a length outside off stump, he hops and defends in a hurry
full delivery outside off stump, looking for that reverse swing, batsman gets the bat down in time
thats a wide moving very quickly down the leg side, batsman looks to flick but misses out, Sangakkara takes it, Bermuda on the board
back of a length outside off stump, driven off the back foot, turning the face of the bat, and finding the gap wide of point
good, fullish delivery on off stump and its defended with ease back to Malinga
great one! Pacy, rising off a good length outside off stump and the batsman arches back to get out of the way
back of a length on off stump, batsman gets right behind the line and defends back to Vaas
a tad fuller this time, and its driven back past the stumps, they think about the run but resist as mid-off moves across
back of a length and angled outside off stump, defended off the back foot in front of point
wider of off stump this time, movement away from him, batsman leaves it be for Sangakkara to collect
good length outside off stump, defended neatly to the off side
slower delivery this time, pitches on a length outside off stump and beats his tame attempt at a drive

edged and gone! Lands on a good length just outside off stump and Mukudden, leaden-footed, just hangs the bat out and and the thin edge is snapped up by a gleeful Sangakkara, Bermuda are two down in no time!
and he's welcomed by a yorker on off stump, which he jams out with the bat coming down just in time
back of a length on middle and leg, pitches and rears up, catching Hemp on the rise and the ball rolls to the off side
lovely! Lands on a great length outside off stump and shaves past Hemp's tame backfoot prod at it, Malinga working up some good pace here
back of a length outside off stump, Hemp stands and plays at it, running it wide of gully for one out to wide third man
good length outside off stump, Pitcher gets half forward and defends to the off side
good length outside off stump, defended to the covers
back of a length outside off stump, Hemp gets behind the line, allows the ball to come onto him, and punches it wide of point for a couple
strays onto the pads and Hemp lifts it over the infield, the ball holds up near the ropes and the two fielders giving chase haul it in
good stuff, lands on a good length, moves, bounces, and clips him in the midriff area
good length outside off stump, driven to Kulasekera, the sub on the field for Jayasuriya, in the covers
good length just outside off stump, neatly driven to cover again
good length delivery outside off stump, very quick, and it beats Hemp's backfoot waft
shot, sir! Overpitched outside off stump and Hemp gets over it in a flash, freeing the arms and carving it away past point for four
back of a length, away-moving delivery outside off stump, Hemp carefully lets it pass
back of a length delivery outside off stump, Hemp plays it off the back foot with good timing, punching in the gap between cover and point for a brace
short of a length outside off stump, very quick, and it beats Hemp's backfoot drive
back of a length outside off stump, up he goes on the toes, pushing into the covers for one to keep strike
good length outside off stump, pushed to Dilshan at backward point
back of a length on middle and leg, Hemp cant work it away for runs no the on side
quicker delivery angled into the ribs, he quickly gets into position to work it away to leg but cant find the gap
back of a length on middle and leg once more, now he manages to find the gap at midwicket for one
overpitched on off stump, he rolls the wrists over it in a jiffy, killing the swing, and finding the gap at midwicket for four, lovely shot!
back of a length on off stump, Pitcher comes forward and defends with confidence
edged and gone! Malinga bangs in a back of a length, 90mph delivery outside off stump that Hemp cant back away from, and the edge flies high off the bat straight to Jayawardene at second slip
and he doesnt trouble the scorers one bit! Malinga! Fires in a dead straight, full delivery that strikes Romaine plumb in front off leg stump, and the umpire has no hesitation in raising the finger!

and how close was that?!? Again, full, straight and moving, Tucker stands rooted and misses the shot, the ball clips him on the leg, everyone appeals, a very good shout but umpire Harper indicates he thought it was sliding down leg....ohhhhh...close, close...replays show it would have clipped leg stump
and thats moving down legs stump, beats all and thats four leg-byes
good length on the stumps, defended to the off side
back of a length outside off stump and lifting, and Tucker does well to get out of the way
good length delivery outside off stump, left alone
back of a length outside off stump, Pitcher gets bat and pad together and defends impressively
back of a good length on middle and leg, he defends and gets an inside-edge to square leg
back of a length outside off stump, he plays it late and runs that to the gully region
back of a length just outside off stump, he gets bat down in a hurry and turns it to the on side
back of a good length outside off stump, defended off the back foot to the off side
what a jaffa! Rising, pacy delivery just outside off stump and the batsman has to arch his back to get out of harm's way
another rising, short of a length delivery outside off stump rears in and catches Pitcher square on the gloves, and the ball rolls to the off side
and instead of the yorker, he opts for a third bouncer, but this time its down leg stump and Pitcher evades
now its a slower, much fuller delivery outside off stump, which Pitcher manages to drive into the covers, looking good on that shot
short of a length outside off stump and Pitcher connects nicely with the backfoot cut, but he cant beat Dilshan at backward point
he gets the yorker length right, but it swings too far into the batsman, whos taken guard outside leg stump, and the ball hits him on the boot
good length, moving into him, caught on the crease as he was rooted, but the appeal is turned down, too high on the pads
good length delivery outside off stump, gets to the pitch and drives to covers
back of a length delivery this time, Tucker drives to the covers again
back of a length on middle and off, Tucker shuffles and works that to midwicket
good length on off stump, he gets behind it and defends back to Vaas
good length outside off stump, he comes onto the front foot and drives to cover
back of a good length outside off stump, he comes forward and defends to the off side
cleaned up! Pitches on a length outside off stump and moves in sharply, off the seam, and beats Pitcher's bat as it comes down angled, to knock back off stump, didnt take long for him to strike!
strays down leg stump, and Minors clips if off the pads for four, fine leg isnt around, and he's off the mark in the World Cup in style
fuller delivery outside off stump, he gets a good stride in and then leaves it be
and another one bites the dust! Lands on a good length, moves away, and Minors, lunging forward, gets a tickle on it which Sangakkara gladfully snaps up! Bermuda in big trouble!
good length outside off stump, he comes to the pitch and drives nicely to mid-off
tossed up down leg stump, batsman pads it away
tossed up, he has a big drive at it and gets beaten, the ball clips the back leg and rolls to the off side
spins in sharply from outside off stump, the batsman stands and manages to get bat on it
fired up on middle and off, now he comes forward and defends
this one's flatter outside off stump, and Tucker plants the front leg forward and clubs it hard past a diving mid-off for four
tosses up the doosra, which Tucker reads well to defend back to Murali
back of a length outside off stump, he walks into it and drives, but gets an inside-edge to the on side
now he comes out of the crease and swings it from outside off stump through midwicket for a couple, Malinga does the fielding
moves in from a length and catches him going forward on the drive, extra bounce saves the batsman
short of a length moving down leg stump, he shuffles across in an attempt to tickle it fine, but mistimes his shot
good shot! Its fuller outside off stump and he picks it up cleanly, slamming it over mid-on for four
back of a length outside off stump, he gets a bit too aggressive, swinging at it wildly and missing all ends up
tossed up on a length on off stump, he gets behind it and defends back to Murali
tossed up this time, he comes forward and smothers the spin
bowled! Flighted up a bit quicker this time, Tucker lunges forward in defense, the ball sneaks in between the bat-pad gap and lazily rolls onto the base of off stump
fired up around off stump, defended to silly point
quicker one on middle and leg, tucked wide of square leg for one to get off the mark
fired in flatter just outside off stump, Cann swings wildly at it and the inside-edge carries it down to deep fine leg
good length outside off stump, Cann again is keen to get on with things, and swings aggressively at it, but cant beat midwicket
a lifter this time outside off stump, Cann thinks about the pull but holds back at the last minute as he sees the ball curl away high
fuller this time and moving into him, he quickly whips that past short fine leg for two
back of a length and moving down leg stump, he tries to tickle it fine but misses out
a good length outside off stump, he leans forward and drives airily to mid-off
slower one, full and moving into leg stump, he shuffles and taps it to the onside but Maharoof moves fast and fields himself
tossed up outside off stump, Borden plays at it and gets beaten
quicker and shorter down leg stump, the doosra not working out that time, and its wide
ripped up outside off stump, inviting the drive, but Borden leaves it be
tossed up again, now he comes forward and defends
fired up again, he comes forward and drives away from his body and gets beaten
pitches well outside leg stump and called wide again
tossed up outside off stump, Borden sticks the pad well out and pads it away
tossed up on leg stump and Borden works it to square leg
back of a length, quicker delivery on off stump that Borden manages to keep out
extra bounce on that one, rises off a shortish length and he plays at it, the leading edge loops up and lands safely on the off side
back of a length outside off stump, he stands rooted and manages to keep it down in front of Dilshan at point
good length just outside off stump, Borden gets half-cock forward and defends to the off side
good length outside off stump, this time he drives back to Maharoof's right
quicker, short of a length delivery lands on leg stump and moves into him, and he's got going nowhere, the ball clips the glove and bobs up to land safely in front of point
fired in on leg stump, the doosra, spins too much and raps him on the leg, a loud appeal but the umpire shakes his head
quicker and flatter on middle and leg, nicely worked wide of midiwicket for the single
moves around the stumps and beats the left-hander with a lovely turner outside off stump
tossed up outside off stump, he knows midwicket and mid-on were inside the circle and has a free swing of the arms, wasnt timed well, hitting with the turn, but placed in the gap for four
tossed up on off stump, comes forward and defends
tossed up on middle and off, gets forward and defends
short of a length outside off stump, Cann gets behind the line and defends off th back foot to cover
huge heave, and nothing but air! Cann looks to go over the top but cant connect with his slog at all
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Cann plays away from his body and runs it down to third man for the single
good length delivery outside off stump, Borden gets forward and defends to cover
back of a good length outside off stump, he drives off the back foot to cover
back of a length on middle and off, defended neatly to the on side
quick, short and flat on leg stump, he looks to work it fine but misses
bang, thats six! Cann uses the feet well to one fired down leg stump, and picks it superbly off the pads to blast it rows back over wide long-on for maximum! Shot!
now he fails to read the doosra, slogging at it, and Sangakkara whips off the bails, but his back leg was just in
fired in on leg stump, he heaves it away through backward square leg for one
tossed up outside off stump, spins in and he taps it to the off side
fired in flatter, he comes forward and defends
back of a length outside off stump, he wafts at it and gets beaten
short and wide, Cann comes down the track, looking  to pull, but ends up topedging it to third man, where Malinga charges across to take the catch but cant get there!
pitched up on middle and leg, Cann drives it to fine leg for one
a low full toss, Borden makes room and plays it to silly point
gone! A slower delivery, pitched up, and Borden just chips it straight to Kulasekera at mid-off!
fired in on middle and leg, he heaves it away through square leg for one more
tossed up, Hurdle comes forward and defends to silly point
hello dollie! Hurdle gets inventive, spinning and slamming a low full toss over deep fine leg for six, I bet he loved that one!
Cann's having a ball! Maharoof drags one in very short and Cann pulls it from outside off stump over midwicket for four

much shorter and wider this time outside off stump, an impetuous Cann cant resist flaying the bat out at it, he has too go a little too far outside off stump and gets a thin under-edge through to Sangakkara...the fun ends for him!
angling down the leg, Leverock turns it to square leg
good length delivery outside off stump, Leverock plays it to cover point
and the crowd erupts in cheer as Leverock works a wide one past point to get off the mark
tossed up, he comes forward and defends
tossed up again, now he gets behind the line and defends back to Murali
tossed up again outside off stump, Leverock defends and they all go up in appeal, but umpire Howell says nope
all over! Murali spins one in faster outside off stump, and it spins in to catch a clueless Leverock going back, he's rapped in front of middle and leg and Howell says yes, thats out, sir!
